trans-unit.source: Trading spot forex, CFDs, options, and spread bets is risky and not suitable for everyone. All of these products (excluding Binary CFDs and Binary Spread Bets) are leveraged, and you can lose more than your initial deposit. Don’t trade more than you can afford to lose.

trans-unit.source: Past performance is not indicative of future results, as returns may vary according to market conditions. No representation is being made that participating in a managed forex account or managed forex trading program will necessarily lead to profit. trans-unit.source: The future is Algo-trading : Conceptual Background
trans-unit.target: 未来是算法交易的概念背景

trans-unit.source: Majority of the people are unaware of the on going Automated Trading revolution. Yet, they are well familiar with other revolutions that have radically changed the world within the past decade: The Internet, Online Trading, Email, Blogs, Google, YouTube, Facebook, Twitter, Skype and the list goes on.
trans-unit.target: 大部分的人是不知道的，持续的自动交易革命。然而，与其他革命，从根本上改变了世界，在过去的十年中，他们是非常熟悉：互联网，网上交易，电子邮件，博客，谷歌，YouTube和Facebook，Twitter的，Skype和列表中的推移。

trans-unit.source: The advent of these technological advances have completely changed how we lead our lives. Could you imagine going about your daily activities without having access to your email, having to do research without search engines or having to execute every trade manually over the phone?
trans-unit.target: 的出现，这些技术的进步，已经完全改变了我们的领导我们的生活。你能想象去了解你的日常活动，而无需访问您的电子邮件，有没有搜索引擎做研究，或通过电话手动执行每一个行业？

trans-unit.source: Yet the investing industry has changed little outside of the use of online brokers. Since the Internet is a powerful empowering technology, tools and information that help people analyze what to buy or sell is widely available and highly accessible. Besides this, everything else pretty much remains the same. Technology has not been utilised to its full potential when it comes to the aspect of trading.
trans-unit.target: 然而，投资的行业变化不大外，使用网上经纪。由于互联网是一个功能强大的授权技术，工具和信息，帮助人们分析买入或卖出的广泛使用，非常方便。除了这个，其他的一切几乎保持不变。技术还没有被利用来充分发挥其潜力，当它涉及到交易方面。

trans-unit.source: The Automated Trading revolution will change all that. As people become more informed about the benefits of Automated Trading, they will begin utilizing these systems to gradually replace old investment strategies. Automated Trading enables higher returns with lesser risks. And, it puts them in control of their money.
trans-unit.target: 自动交易革命将改变这一切。随着人们更多地了解自动交易的好处，他们将开始利用这些系统，以逐步取代旧的投资策略。自动交易能够实现更高的回报较少的风险。而且，它使他们在控制自己的钱。

trans-unit.source: The most important benefit of Automated Trading systems is the value it creates for users. The use of technical analysis to trade using a defined system creates consistency, negates human emotion, and recognises opportunity for superior returns.
trans-unit.target: 自动交易系统的最重要的好处是它为用户创造的价值。使用技术分析交易使用已定义的系统创建一致性，否定人类的情感，认识的机会，丰厚的回报。

trans-unit.source: It is arguable that the realisation of Automated Trading is driven largely by Artificial Intelligence advancements of the last decade. And that’s probably true. Besides this powerful force, there is another trend that has supported Automated Trading in a big way: the dawn of high speed Internet.
trans-unit.target: 这是值得商榷的，很大程度上是由人工智能的进步在过去十年中实现自动交易。这可能是真实的。除了这种强大的力量，是另一种趋势，支持自动交易的一大途径：曙光高速互联网。

trans-unit.source: Why is the internet integral to Automated Trading? It allows the masses to benefit from it, practically anyone with access to a computer and an internet connection. Currently Automated Trading systems are being used mainly by hedge fund managers and these systems are capable of producing outstanding returns. However, the underlying issue is that most hedge funds are restricted to accredited investors. In other words, the average investor are excluded from participation.
trans-unit.target: 为什么是互联网不可或缺的自动交易吗？它可以让群众从中受益，实际上任何人只要有一台电脑和互联网连接的访问。自动交易系统，主要用于对冲基金经理，这些系统能够产生可观的回报。然而，根本的问题是，大多数对冲基金仅限于经认可的投资者。换言之，平均投资者被排除在外。

trans-unit.source: High speed internet overcomes this problem because it allows Automated Trading systems to connect directly to an individual’s trading account. Even if they only have a few thousand dollars in their account, they can still reap the benefits of advanced artificial intelligence Automated Trading systems since there is no minimum net worth or income requirements to open a regular trading account.
trans-unit.target: 高速互联网克服了这个问题，因为它允许自动交易系统直接连接到一个单独的交易账户。即使在他们的帐户，他们只有几千元，他们仍然可以从中受益的先进的人工智能自动交易系统，因为没有最低净资产或收入要求打开常规交易帐户。

trans-unit.source: Automated Trading systems and the internet will change the financial future of individuals throughout the world. These systems will revolutionize and redefine the foundations of the investment industry and Maxim Trader is at the forefront of this phenomenon.
trans-unit.target: 自动交易系统和互联网将改变未来的财务状况，世界各地的人们。这些系统将彻底改变和重新定义的基础产业的投资和Maxim的交易是在这种现象的最前沿。

trans-unit.source: WHAT DOES THIS MEAN TO YOU, THE INDIVIDUAL INVESTORS?
trans-unit.target: 个人投资者对你来说是什么意思？

trans-unit.source: It means that the shift to using Automated Trading can happen faster than ever before. It is easy for people to be better informed about how it works and why these systems can help in their goal towards achieving financial freedom. And, perhaps most compelling, as computers become ever faster and technology improves, the returns from these systems will further enhance. That translates to higher returns and lower risks.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着可以使用自动交易比以往任何时候都更快的速度发生。这是很容易为人们更好地了解它是如何工作的，以及为什么这些系统可以帮助实现财务上的自由，他们的目标。而且，也许最引人注目的，如电脑越来越快，技术的改进，的回报这些系统将进一步提高。这转化为更高的回报和降低风险。

trans-unit.source: One criticism of Automated Trading is that once too many people use it, it will cease to work. Contrary to such a speculation, the opposite is true. In actual fact, as more Automated Trading systems are used and more assets are traded, it is more likely to detect trends and of course, make money. Presently, majority of trading decisions are still made by human traders. As Automated Trading systems grow, more executions of decisions will be determined by computers instead. These systems are much simpler and have much less variation in their decisions therefore making it even easier to identify market trends and patterns.
trans-unit.target: 自动交易的批评之一是，一旦太多人使用它，它就会停止工作。相反，这样的猜测，事实正好相反。事实上，更多的自动交易系统的使用和更多的资产交易，它是更可能检测到的趋势，当然，赚钱。目前，大多数的交易决策仍然是由人贩子。自动交易系统的发展，更多的执行的决定将取决于由计算机代替。这些系统更加简单和有变化要小得多，因此，他们的决定使其更容易识别市场趋势和模式。

trans-unit.source: Another result of such automated systems is an increase in volatility. Most Automated Trading systems detect and ride trends. As more computers ride the same trends faster, the compounding effect will cause the movement to become bigger. Bigger trends then attract more Automated Trading systems and people, and a virtuous circle is created. Automated Trading systems will perform better as these trends become bigger and easier to identify and take advantage of.
trans-unit.target: 这样的自动化系统的另一个结果是增加的波动性。自动交易系统的检测和骑趋势。随着越来越多的电脑更快地骑同样的趋势，复利效应将导致运动做大。更大的趋势，然后吸引更多的自动交易系统和人民，并创造了一个良性循环。自动交易系统有更好的表现，因为这些趋势变得更大，更容易识别和利用。

trans-unit.source: So, it is evident that Automated Trading will revolutionize how people trade the markets. A big change like this is not happening for the first time. The internet itself changed the way that people interact. It has made it possible for anyone regardless of capital to trade in the FOREX market. This gave rise to the retail trading market which is one of the most profitable businesses in the world
trans-unit.target: 所以，显而易见的是，自动交易将彻底改变人们的市场交易。像这样的一个大的变化不是第一次发生。互联网本身改变了人们互动的方式。它使人们有可能对任何人，无论资本在外汇市场上进行交易。这引起了零售交易市场，这是在世界上最赚钱的企业之一

trans-unit.source: More than $1.9 trillion U.S dollar is traded daily in the Forex market and it is with no doubt the largest financial market in the world. It is composed of approximately 4,500 international world banks and retail brokers and exponential growth has been recorded over the past few years.
trans-unit.target: 超过$19000亿美元每天在外汇市场上进行交易，毫无疑问，这是在世界上最大的金融市场。它是由约4500名国际全球银行和零售经纪和已被记录在过去几年呈指数级增长。

trans-unit.source: People buy and sell different currencies, in an attempt to make money as the relative values fluctuate. Forex is popular as it allows traders very fast executions, has tight spreads and provides high leverage. Yet human traders are not the only ones who can benefit from these advantages.
trans-unit.target: 人们买和卖不同的货币，赚钱的相对价值波动。外汇交易是受欢迎，因为它允许交易者非常快速的执行，有严格的利差，并提供高杠杆。然而，人类是不是唯一的交易商谁可以受益于这些优势。

trans-unit.source: With the Automated Trading Systems, a given currency pair can be traded and its relative prices monitored in real time. The systems can make a buying or selling decision in a fraction of a second, and send executions for orders with ruthless efficiency and accuracy. Considering the immensely liquid and highly volatile nature of the currency market, an Automated Trading System is an apt solution.
trans-unit.target: 的自动交易系统，可以在给定的货币对交易的实时监控其相对价格。该系统可以在几分之一秒的一个买进或卖出的决定，无情的效率和准确性发送订单执行。考虑到货币市场的极大的液体，高挥发性的性质，自动交易系统是一个恰当的解决方案。

trans-unit.source: Automated Trading is not a silver bullet for investing, and there are still risks associated with it. However, it will continue to improve with technology and help millions of people achieve financial independence. We recognise the fact that Automated Trading Systems that trade the currencies market will play a huge role in this revolution.
trans-unit.target: 自动交易投资的灵丹妙药，而且还有相关的风险。然而，将继续提高技术，并帮助数百万人实现财务独立。我们认识到，事实上，货币市场交易，自动交易系统将在这场革命中发挥了巨大的作用。

trans-unit.source: We are excited about the prospects of Automated Trading Systems. These computer programs automatically buy and sell currencies , stocks, options and other liquid assets, akin to a human trader. The big improvement however, is that positive returns are consistently generate with the absence of emotional reactions present in human traders.
trans-unit.target: 我们很高兴的自动交易系统的发展前景。这些计算机程序自动购买和出售货币，股票，期权及其他流动资产，类似于一个人的交易者。很大的改善，是持续产生正回报的情况下的情绪反应，目前在人贩子。

trans-unit.source: Many different strategies are being explored for these Automated Trading Systems . Usually, a trading program would be encoded, but we at Hexagon wanted to take it up a notch. What if we could develop Artificial Intelligence that could generate its own trading systems? Would it be possible to create systems that work better than those designed by humans?
trans-unit.target: 正在探索许多不同的策略，这些自动交易系统。通常情况下，交易程序进行编码，但我们在六角希望把它上升了一个档次。如果我们能够开发人工智能，可能会产生自己的交易系统？它可以创建系统更好地工作比人类设计的吗？

trans-unit.source: Our answer here is yes. Artificial Intelligence empowers the computer to generate its own trading strategies. These strategies have the potential to provide better returns with less risk as compared to human traders. Many people have doubts in such a possibility.
trans-unit.target: 在这里，我们的答案是肯定的。人工智能授权的计算机来生成自己的交易策略。这些策略有可能以更低的风险相比，人贩子提供更好的回报。很多人都怀疑这种可能性。

trans-unit.source: The age old problem for human traders lies in the natural possession of emotions. As humans, virtually every trader is at the mercy of their emotions regardless of how much they try, or think they can suppress it . When you win, you are elated. When you lose, you are dejected. Many people enjoy this thrill. This common ailment is known as gambling. People do it at the casino, and they do it when they trade. It requires a very special mindset to totally eradicate emotions during trading. Seldom does any trader manage to master this skill. Even if they do, it could be at the hands of very highly priced mistake or what we call, learning process.
trans-unit.target: 老问题在于对人贩子的自然拥有的情感。作为人，几乎每一个交易者是在怜悯自己的情绪，不管多少他们试图，或认为他们可以抑制它。当你赢了，你心花怒放。当你输了，你黯然神伤。许多人享受这种快感。这种常见的疾病被称为赌博。做到这一点的人在赌场，他们这样做时，他们交易。它需要一个非常特殊的心态，彻底根除在交易情绪。很少有商人能掌握这个技能。即使他们这样做，它可以在手中的价格非常高的错误就是我们所说的，学习过程。

trans-unit.source: The reason behind the reduced risk is because Artificial Intelligence generated automated trading systems can measure risk better than any human ever could. Computers are, literally, great at computational work, and that includes statistical analysis commonly used to measure trading strategies. We have found it possible for an integrated risk management system that leverages off the computer’s number crunching ability to develop an automated trading system that deals less risk.
trans-unit.target: 降低了风险背后的原因是因为人工智能自动交易系统可以测量风险比任何人都做不到的。从字面上看，计算机是巨大的计算工作，和通常用来衡量交易策略，其中包括统计分析。我们发现有可能为一体的综合风险管理系统，充分利用计算机的数字运算能力开发的自动交易系统，交易风险较小。

trans-unit.source: Another major advantage to using an Artificial Intelligence approach to developing automated trading systems is that computers are getting faster all the time. What is brand new today is probably replaced 6 months down the road. As computing power continue to improve, so do the results of Artificial Intelligence systems. That means given all things constant and we do absolutely nothing, the results of an Artificial Intelligence system will improve purely based on hardware advancement.
trans-unit.target: 使用人工智能的方法来开发自动交易系统的另一个主要优势是，电脑越来越快的时间。什么是全新的，今天可能是更换了6个月的道路上。随着计算能力的不断提高，这样做的结果，人工智能系统。这意味着所有的东西不变，我们什么都不做，结果的人工智能系统将提高纯粹基于硬件的进步。

trans-unit.source: There is already a paradigm shift on a global scale as Hedge funds and global trading banks are developing proprietary systems that are singularly responsible for the massive jump in trading volume across all asset classes.
trans-unit.target: 已经有一个模式的转变在全球范围内，对冲基金和全球交易银行正在开发的专有系统是奇负责在所有资产类别的交易量巨大的飞跃。

trans-unit.source: Hexagon has undertaken a similar action in this massive revolution for automated trading systems at the retail level so that all our clients can gain this ‘unfair advantage’ when we pit man versus machine.
trans-unit.target: 六角已经采取了类似的行动在这场声势浩大的革命，在零售水平，使我们的客户能够获得这种“不公平优势”时，我们坑的人与机器的自动交易系统。

trans-unit.source: MAN VERSUS MACHINE : THE OUTCOME IS OBVIOUS
trans-unit.target: 人与机器的结果是显而易见的

Everything is taken care of so you have peace of mind.
trans-unit.target: 被托管在ASP或部署在用户的环境，允许更灵活的选择。通过部署我们的算法交易系统，你不再是在不稳定的互联网连接的怜悯或硬件故障，您的最终相抗衡。一切都让你安心照顾。

trans-unit.source: Trade strategies are included with deployment.

develops these algorithmic trading strategies based on our proprietary requirements and includes those with the system deployed. This can be easily converted into automated Forex trading software and strategies.

trans-unit.source: Our distributed design is built for high-performance strategies, with the ability to manage virtually unlimited numbers of order slices across multiple asset classes in multiple venues. Each element of an algorithmic trading strategy can be analysed separately and in combination over market and trading history. Our expertise has allowed
trans-unit.target: 我们的分布式的设计是专为高性能的战略，管理跨多个资产类别在多个场合几乎无限数量的顺序片的能力。算法交易策略的每一个元素可以单独进行分析，并结合对市场和交易历史记录。我们的专业知识

trans-unit.source: to develop ground-breaking transaction cost analysis techniques.
trans-unit.target: 开发突破性的交易成本分析技术。

trans-unit.source: is not designed to be directional, but instead working the bid/offer spread to its maximum advantage while nevertheless moving price up or down like a game of Chutes and Ladders. The Volume Weighted Average Price (VWAP) is one of the more simplistic tools to follow that taps into some of the order-flow peculiarities of the algo-trading phenomenon.
trans-unit.target: 是不是设计为定向，而是工作的买入/卖出差价最大的优势，但移动价格上涨或下跌，就像一场槽和梯子。成交量加权平均价（VWAP）是一个更简单的工具，水龙头到一些订单流特点的算法交易的现象。

trans-unit.source: A very brief glimpse into our formulation, the VWAP, is calculated by dividing the sum of the dollars traded (price multiplied by share volume) for every transaction by the total shares traded for the day.
trans-unit.target: 我们的配方，VWAP，一个非常短暂的一瞥计算的总和除以交易的美元（价格乘以所占体积）的每一笔交易，交易的总股数的一天。

trans-unit.source: Pj = the price of trade j
trans-unit.target: Pj = the price of trade j

trans-unit.source: Qj = the quantity of trade j
trans-unit.target: Qj = the quantity of trade j

trans-unit.source: j = each trade taking place over the time period
trans-unit.target: j = each trade taking place over the time period

trans-unit.source: The center green line is the Volume Weighted Average Price (VWAP) with one and two standard deviations (STD) marked. The blue and red arrows are suggested entry points, buying and selling to take advantage of the price discovery. The 100-period simple moving average (pink line) can be used to aid with trend direction.
trans-unit.target: 该中心的绿线是一个和两个标准差（STD）标记的成交量加权平均价（VWAP）。蓝色和红色箭头建议的入口点，购买和销售优势的价格发现。 100期简单移动平均线（粉红色）可以用来帮助与趋势方向。

trans-unit.source: When the price bar closes through the VWAP, then a move to the second STD should be anticipated. Using the VWAP as a median line similar in nature to a pivot, that once penetrated and confirmed by a close, indicates that further advancement is likely. On subsequent bars, if there is no further advance, then a pullback to the first STD can be expected — again, using the close as a confirmation with a stop and reverse strategy either on a failure below the VWAP or at the top/bottom of the range and the second STD.
trans-unit.target: 当价格吧关闭通过交易量加权平均价格，然后移动到第二STD应该可以预知的。作为中线性质类似的一个支点，一旦渗透，密切证实，使用VWAP表示，进一步的进步是可能的。在随后的酒吧中，如果没有进一步提前，然后回调至第一性病可以预期 - 再次，使用close停止和反向策略作为确认之VWAP下面的故障或在顶部/底部的范围和所述第二性病。

trans-unit.source: Optimised trading - Long term approach with short term gains
trans-unit.target: 优化的交易 - 长期与短期收益的方法

trans-unit.source: Traders tend to fall largely into the category known as momentum strategists. The characteristics of these traders are they tend to look for breakouts, buying high in the hopes of selling even higher. More often that not, they get trapped by the whipsaw of the algorithm and end upside-down on their positions. Conversely, this does not happen in algo-trading performed by the
trans-unit.target: 交易商趋于下降主要是被称为势头战略家的范畴。这些商人的特点是，他们往往寻找突破，购买高卖得更高的希望。更多的时候，他们被困洗盘的算法和上下颠倒自己的立场。相反，这不会发生在所执行的算法的交易

trans-unit.source: programmed to detect long-term trader behavior and establish the degree of power of the buying pressure. The time horizon of such a strategy looks at the market in a holistic way and targets the opportunity for a larger advance. The primary concern is whether the long-term trader will be aggressive and buy as price rises or be passive and try to buy low and create a basing action? This is when child orders come into play. By monitoring child orders,
trans-unit.target: 编程来检测中长线交易者行为，建立权力的买盘压力的程度。这种策略的时间跨度着眼于市场的一个整体的方式，一个更大的前进目标的机会。主要的问题是中长线交易者是否会是积极的，购买价格上涨是被动的，尽量买低，并创建一个基于行动？这是当子订单开始发挥作用。通过监测子订单，

trans-unit.source: can sniff out long-term trading action and effectively front-run orders, believing that if there was a buyer at x, then they will pay x-plus to fill additional positions.
trans-unit.target: 可以嗅出了长期的贸易行动，并有效地运行前的订单，相信，如果有一个买家在x，那么他们将支付X-PLUS，以填补额外的位置。

trans-unit.source: Time-Weighted Average Price (TWAP) has always been in the domain of the institutional trader. Essentially it is akin to a dollar-averaging process. Institutions may wish to achieve a particular percentage or market share where time becomes an added factor for consideration rather than purely volume. For example, they may buy a line of stock whereby they remain constant at, say, 10% of the volume transacted. An alternative would be to transact a certain quantity split into x units every minute over a 15-minute time period.
trans-unit.target: 时间加权平均的价格（TWAP）一直在域中的机构交易。本质上，它是类似于一美元平均过程。机构可能希望实现一个特定的百分比或市场份额的时间成为一个增值的考虑因素，而不是单纯的量。例如，他们可能会买的股票，使他们保持不变，说，10％的成交量。另一种方法是x单位分割成每分钟超过15分钟的时间内办理一定的数量。

trans-unit.source: This creates the impression that they will not upset the natural order flow and balance of the market. The reality is that an institution, despite being price conscious, needs to reflect the average of all their buys vs. sells rather than the actual price. This is complicated additionally in that the objective of some funds is to invest and monitor performance on a relative basis. This might be performance measured against their peers or some benchmark, whereas other funds are more about actual performance.
trans-unit.target: 这给人的印象，他们不会破坏自然的市场流通秩序和平衡。现实情况是，一个机构，尽管是价格意识，需要其所有的购买与销售，而不是实际的价格，以反映平均。另外这是复杂的，在一些基金的目标是投资和监视性能在相对的基础。这可能是衡量他们的同龄人或一些基准性能，而其他基金的实际表现。

trans-unit.source: Unlike these large players, retail traders are not blessed with inordinate amounts of money and simply seek fair value calculation identified by volume. However, pure volume probably is irrelevant, as it is the pattern created that becomes key. After all, how many times have traders intoned how volume is weak yet price continues to grind higher?
trans-unit.target: 与这些大玩家，分销商不拥有得天独厚的过多的钱，单纯追求量确定的公允价值计算。然而，纯量可能是无关紧要的，因为它是产生的图案，就成为关键。毕竟，有多少次贸易商吟诵量是薄弱的，但价格继续走高？

trans-unit.source: can correct this by providing a relative view of the markets, and traders thereby can align themselves with our high-frequency algorithmic trading rather than fight the machines.
trans-unit.target: 纠正此问题的市场，提供了一个相对的观点和贸易商从而能够把自己与我们的高频算法交易，而不是打机。
